text:
This MAY be a DB2 issue,  I'm running DB2 7 FP5

I'll try to attach a script file to this report.

If I run "target1", it works fine.  If I subsequently run "target2", it works 
fine.

If I run "build" or "target3", I get the following failure:

java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: Native Library D:\SQLLIB\bin\db2jdbc.dll 
already loaded in another classloader
creator: brian.bonner@paraware.com

text:
Please try one of the 1.5beta, driver caching is now performed and you should 
not bump into this problem.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 2971 ***
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
